intro.title: When you meet your perfect tablet,
anything's
possible.
intro.headline: Meet our family of over-achievers.
intro.subhead: Dell tablets offer meaningful flexibility and choice, allowing you to easily connect, access and share in the way that is most natural for you.

copyBox.headline: Brilliant clarity
copyBox.subhead: See more with the 10.8" Full HD 1080p with Dell Active Stylus support and 10-point touch display.

copyBox.headline: Full flexibility
copyBox.subhead: A full-size detachable keyboard makes it easy to turn your tablet into a laptop with full docking capability.

copyBox.headline: Power up
copyBox.subhead: Stay charged with up to 10 hours of battery life, plus swappable battery support. Add the optional Mobility Keyboard with an embedded battery and go even longer between charges.

copyBox.headline: Conference technology
copyBox.subhead: Meet remotely with the 2mp (front)/8mp (rear) cameras, SRS premium audio and adaptive noise cancelling using 2 mics for video conferencing and soft phone.

copyBox.headline: High performance
copyBox.subhead: Boost speed with a powerful Intel® Atom™ processor (up to Intel® Core™ i5).

threeSixty.title: Dell Venue 8 Pro
threeSixty.descr: The ultimate productivity companion with Windows 8.1

copyBox.headline: Vivid clarity
copyBox.subhead: You’ll appreciate your apps on an 8" HD IPS (1280x800) display with 10-point multi-touch.

copyBox.headline: Compact operation
copyBox.subhead: Snap photos and shoot video with easy, one-handed operation and a soft-touch textured back.

copyBox.headline: Updated operating system
copyBox.subhead: Experience enhanced functionality for current and legacy apps with Windows 8.1, including full Windows Office support.

copyBox.headline: High performance
copyBox.subhead: Go full speed ahead with 4th Gen Intel® Atom™ processors (1.8GHz Quad Core™), mobile broadband options and wireless video for apps like Netflix®.

copyBox.headline: Productivity boosters
copyBox.subhead: An optional wireless keyboard case and Dell Active Stylus provide support for easy annotation.

copyBox.headline: High resolution
copyBox.subhead: Enjoy your apps on an 8" HD (1280x800) display with both front (2 MP) and back (5 MP) cameras.

copyBox.headline: Power player
copyBox.subhead: Expect high-performance with Intel® Atom™ processors (2.0GHz Dual Core™).

copyBox.headline: Thin and light
copyBox.subhead: At less than 9.5mm thin, you can play your favorite Android-based games on your lap, or pop in your bag and get going.

copyBox.headline: Power up
copyBox.subhead: Watch movies, play games or catch up on social media with up to 10 hours of battery life.

copyBox.headline: Vivid display
copyBox.subhead: Snap photos or shoot video on a 7" HD (1280x800) display with both front (1.2 MP) and back (5 MP) cameras.

copyBox.headline: Power player
copyBox.subhead: Expect high-performance with Intel® Atom processors (1.6 GHz Dual Core).

copyBox.headline: Thin and light
copyBox.subhead: At less than 9.5mm thin, you can play your favorite Android-based games on your lap, or pop in your bag and get going.

copyBox.headline: Power up
copyBox.subhead: Watch movies, play games or catch up on social media with up to 10 hours of battery life.
